title: SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair-Backrest and Seat Height Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support(Gray)-Fabric
descriptions:
Title: SITMOD Gaming Chair for Adults with Footrest – Ergonomic High-Back Computer Chair, Adjustable Lumbar and Headrest, 90°–150° Recline, 360° Swivel, Fabric Upholstery, Gray

Overview:
Level up your game and work sessions with the SITMOD Ergonomic Gaming Chair. Built for comfort, performance, and durability, this high-back chair features a retractable footrest, adjustable lumbar and headrest pillows, and a smooth 90°–150° recline to keep you supported from grind to victory. Upholstered in breathable fabric with a sleek gray finish, it’s designed to look sharp in both gaming setups and home offices.

Key Features:
- Ergonomic support: High-back design with adjustable lumbar support and headrest pillows to align your spine and reduce fatigue.
- Recline and relax: Lockable recline from 90° to 150° plus a retractable footrest for power breaks and movie-mode comfort.
- All-day comfort: Soft, high-density thickened sponge seat cushion and upholstered armrests for cushy, pressure-relieving support.
- Smooth mobility: 360° swivel and durable rolling base for easy movement between tasks.
- Built to last: Solid thick steel frame, heavy-duty nylon base, and SGS-certified 4-level gas cylinder for safety and stability.
- Breathable finish: Carbon fiber–style accents with fabric upholstery for a cool, comfortable sit.
- Versatile use: Ideal for gaming, streaming, studying, and office work.

Specifications:
- Color: Gray
- Upholstery: Fabric with carbon fiber-style detailing
- Dimensions (Overall): 23" W x 20" D x 49–52" H
- Seat: 20.5" W x 20.8" D
- Backrest: 22" W x 32.6" H
- Height Adjustment: 3.2"
- Swivel: 360 degrees
- Recline Range: 90°–150°
- Footrest: Retractable
- Armrests: Upholstered
- Weight Capacity: Up to 300 lbs
- Cylinder: SGS certified 4-level
- Assembly: Required (tools and instructions included)

What’s in the box:
- SITMOD gaming chair (Gray)
- Adjustable lumbar pillow and headrest pillow
- Retractable footrest (preassembled to chair mechanism)
- Hardware kit and tools
- Step-by-step assembly manual

Warranty and Support:
- Customer satisfaction guarantee with no-questions-asked returns
- Free parts replacement and responsive support for any issues or questions

Why you’ll love it:
This chair blends pro-level ergonomics with plush comfort so you can stay locked in longer. From quick tilt adjustments to full recline and feet-up breaks, the SITMOD Gaming Chair adapts to how you play and work—without compromising on style or support.
